subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

BRITNEY SPEARS BACK ON STAGE!
For the first time
in more than three years, Britney Spears hits the stage in a
surprise show! Is Britney finally getting her act together
after her tumultuous divorce, head-shaving, and rehab? The
inside story, tonight on TV's most provocative entertainment
news show.

THE NASTIEST CELEBRITY CUSTODY BATTLES
EVER!		   
Alec Baldwin and Kim Basinger's fight
over their daughter Ireland has been very public, and very
nasty, but that's only the beginning! Tonight, Showbiz Tonight
has the outrageous stories of the biggest knock-down, drag-out
celebrity custody fights ever!

BIRKHEAD AND THE BABY
COME HOME
Anna Nicole Smith's ex-boyfriend has arrived in
Kentucky with their daughter, Dannielynn -- but what happens
next? The court fights are far from over, and we are right
there to find out the next steps in the battle, only on Showbiz
Tonight.

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Britney Spears performs again: Can she ever be as big as
she was?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND US
A VIDEO EMAIL!

Day on video. Look into your camera and tell us what you think.
Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To send your video
email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses
on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline Prime.
